doc:
Courtney Thorne-Smith https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Courtney_Thorne-Smith 0 Courtney Thorne-Smith (born November 8, 1967) is an American actress. She is best known for her roles as Alison Parker on Melrose Place, Georgia Thomas on Ally McBeal, Cheryl in According to Jim, and her recurring role on Two and a Half Men as Lyndsey McElroy. Courtney_Thorne-Smith ( born November_8_,_1967 ) is an_American_actress . She is_best_known for her_roles as Alison_Parker on Melrose_Place , Georgia_Thomas on Ally_McBeal , Cheryl in According to Jim , and her_recurring_role on Two and a_Half_Men as Lyndsey_McElroy .
